message: Bob, I have a fantastic opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire [product description] for a price of $1,650,000. This product is worth a minimum of $1,500,000 to me, so I'm confident this is a fair deal. It's a valuable asset with incredible potential, and I believe it would be a great addition to your portfolio. Let me know if you're interested, as I have other potential buyers lined up.
